Line.Text: The executive area’s corridors greet you with dead silence; you respond with the sound of your footsteps.[pause] As the door mentioned by Jackie comes into view, you see that it was left wide open, revealing a part of a spacious office behind it.[pause] The nameplate is here too, hanging unassumingly to the left as promised but saying “Michael D. Morton, CEO” for some reason.

Before you can properly process this bit of information, however, you notice an old man hunched over a desk inside. The man sees you as well and beckons you in with a weary smile.[pause] He looks… not like one might imagine a super powerful corporation’s boss.
